SEARCH
Package com.example.dangle_lotto

Class GeneralUser

java.lang.Object
com.example.dangle_lotto.User
com.example.dangle_lotto.GeneralUser
public class GeneralUser extends User
GeneralUser — model for a general application user (entrant or organizer).

This class represents a regular user in the system who may or may not have permissions to organize events. It extends the abstract User class and provides functionality to retrieve user-specific event information such as registered, chosen, signed-up, or cancelled events.

Admin-specific users should extend the Admin subclass instead, which includes higher-level management privileges.

Since:
2025-11-01

  • Constructor Details

    • GeneralUser

      public GeneralUser(String uid, String name, String username, String email, String phone, com.google.firebase.firestore.GeoPoint location, String pid, String did, FirebaseManager firebaseManager, boolean canOrganize, boolean notis)
      Constructs a new GeneralUser object with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      uid - Unique Firebase user ID.
      name - User’s display name.
      username - User's username.
      email - User’s email address.
      phone - User’s phone number (nullable).
      location - User’s location (nullable).
      pid - Profile photo identifier (nullable).
      did - User device identifier (nullable).
      firebaseManager - Reference to the FirebaseManager for database operations.
      canOrganize - Whether the user has organizer privileges.
      notis - Whether the user has notifications enabled.

  • Method Details

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Deletes this user and all associated data from Firebase.

      This method calls FirebaseManager.deleteUser(String) and removes all references to this user, including event registrations and organized events.

    • getLocation

      public com.google.firebase.firestore.GeoPoint getLocation()

    • registeredEvents

      public void registeredEvents(FirebaseCallback<ArrayList<String>> callback)
      Retrieves a list of event IDs for events where this user is registered (waiting list).
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback to handle the resulting list of event IDs or an error.

    • chosenEvents

      public void chosenEvents(FirebaseCallback<ArrayList<String>> callback)
      Retrieves a list of event IDs for events where this user has been chosen through the lottery.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback to handle the resulting list of event IDs or an error.

    • signedUpEvents

      public void signedUpEvents(FirebaseCallback<ArrayList<String>> callback)
      Retrieves a list of event IDs for events this user has signed up to attend after being chosen from the lottery.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback to handle the resulting list of event IDs or an error.

    • cancelledEvents

      public void cancelledEvents(FirebaseCallback<ArrayList<String>> callback)
      Retrieves a list of event IDs for events this user has cancelled or declined after being chosen from the lottery.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback to handle the resulting list of event IDs or an error.

    • canOrganize

      public boolean canOrganize()
      Checks whether this user has the privilege to organize events.
      Returns:
      true if the user can organize events, otherwise false.

    • setCanNotOrganize

      public void setCanNotOrganize()
      Sets whether this user can organize events.

    • isAdmin

      public boolean isAdmin()
      Checks if this user is an admin.

      For GeneralUser, this always returns false. Admin users should override this in a subclass.

      Specified by:
      isAdmin in class User
      Returns:
      false, since GeneralUser is not an admin.
